Student Grants!

By Chris Hamilton May 13, 2013 May 13, 2013 Tweet Like +1

Congratulations to graduate students Diego Morales Briones and Hannah Marx! Both received multiple graduate student awards this spring. Hannah was awarded a Society for the Study of Evolution Rosemary Grant Award for Graduate Student Research and a Society of Systematic Biologists Graduate Student Research Award, and Diego was awarded a Botanical Society of America Graduate Student Research Award and an American Society of Plant Taxonomists Graduate Student Research Award. A proud day in the Tank Lab!
